item.title: Time Higher Education article
item.description:
My co-author Michael McAleer was interviewed by Times Higher Education reporter Ellie Bothwell in connection with our article “Size, internationalization, and university rankings: evaluating and predicting Times Higher Education (THE) data for Japan”.

You can read the article published on-line on 21 November 2019 on the THE website.

item.title: Nikkei Newspaper article
item.description:
Nikkei Newspaper Staff Writer Shuhei Yamamoto came to Kobe University to interview Kentaro Iwatsubo, Yasuo Takatsuki and myself about our work on commodity derivatives.

You can find the article about our work published 25 June 2019 in the Nikkei or by copying this URL: https://www.nikkei.com/article/ DGXMZO46496130U9A620C1000000/
